content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully placed on the map. Multiple recovery steps attempted to craft and deploy a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) – the intended structure for supplying Automation Science Packs for research – but all placement and crafting efforts failed due to inventory and resource shortages.

ERROR TIPS
• Errors with entity retrieval:
  - Avoid unexpected parameters when calling get_entities. Incorrect usage such as supplying a keyword ('radius') or extra positional arguments caused TypeErrors. Confirm the function’s signature before passing arguments.
• Lab placement and inventory checks:
  - Before attempting to place a Lab at a desired position, verify that a Lab item exists in the inventory. This prevents placement errors due to a missing laboratory.
• Handling null query results:
  - Check that the result from entity queries is not None before iterating over it to avoid errors like "'NoneType' object is not iterable."
• Lab crafting resource management:
  - Ensure that all required sub-ingredients (e.g., iron-gear-wheels, copper-cables, electronic-circuits) are available and that their supply chains (such as sufficient smelting of iron and copper plates) are properly established. Addressing these shortages will help prevent repeated lab crafting failures.
